Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Capital City in 1982...
Injured on 7/19/1983 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/14/1986...
Had first career hit on 9/22/1987, off Kevin Crandell (SYR)...
Traded from Capital City to Halifax on 7/8/1988 (Going to CC: P W. Cerda, P K. Sims. Going to HAL: P F. Stetler)...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/14/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $592,800 per year...
Injured on 8/24/1991 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/12/1992 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
